definition: a short note recognizing a source of information or of a quoted passage, to call in an official matter, such as to attend court
details:
noun
- a short note recognizing a source of information or of a quoted passage
= synonyms: credit
verb
- to call in an official matter, such as to attend court
= synonyms: summons
- to advance evidence for
= example: to advance evidence for
= synonyms: abduce
- to commend
= example: to commend
= synonyms: mention
- to repeat a passage from
= synonyms: quote
- to refer to for illustration or proof
= synonyms: quote
- to make reference to
= example: to make reference to
= synonyms: name
- to refer to
= synonyms: reference
